General.Name: Hsinli Chemical Industrial
General.Description: HsinLi Chemical Industrial Corp. manufactures and sells PU and PVC products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers TPU products, moisture-penetrate PU films, and PU synthetic leather products; and leather sofa, wallpapers, car seats, seat covers, and cushions. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 121, Huazong Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 726
